caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Respondent, v. DONALD FONVILLE, Appellant.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division One.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeals from the Superior Court for Snohomish County, Nos. 95-1-00981-1, 95-1-00979-9, Gerald L. Knight and Joseph A. Thibodeau, JJ., entered December 20, 1995, and May 8, 1996.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed by unpublished opinion per Becker, J., concurred in by Agid, A.C.J., and Ellington, J.
